name: Vexatious Match 3 - Four more digits
description:
Match three digits using a specific number of a digit in this Match 3 puzzle game. Now featuring 4 more digits including a very unique one.

So I went to Increpare's Vexatious Match 3 game's source code to see how the game works when I saw that there were 3 unused digits. The sprites were drawn and they were implemented to the editor but they weren't fully functional, so I made them work like the other digits and added a new one. I also showed what I did to the original creator, and he actually liked it ! So I decided to make a full game with that.

Original :
